value.title: StarCraft 2: REYNOR's Protoss vs HEROMARINE! (Best-of-3)
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2. In this best-of-3 series of Protoss versus Terran, we see a variety of playstyles from both players. value.title: StarCraft 2: PROFESSIONAL 2v2?! (Maru & sOs vs MaxPax & souL)

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
